meanings.definition: Third-person singular simple present indicative form of preaccustom. To accustom beforehand.
meanings.english_definition: Third-person singular simple present indicative of preaccustom. To accustom beforehand.

examples.sentence: The training preaccustoms him to the harsh conditions he will face.
examples.translation: その訓練は、彼が直面するであろう過酷な状況に彼を事前に慣れさせる。
